participant_1.background:
I am a freelancer because I can choose my own hours and work from anywhere.
i didn t go to college because i run the family farm.
i am single and live alone.
My biggest fear is that my dogs will run off and get lost.
My family is very supportive of my writing.

participant_2.background:
I read my favorite book Twilight on the beach while on vacation.
i used to work as an actress.
i also dance and sing.
my favorite food is sushi.
I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm just relaxing and enjoying a cup of green tea.
That sounds nice. I'm actually a freelancer who writes from home.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of things do you write?
I write mostly fiction, but I also do some blogging and copywriting.
That's awesome! I used to be an actress, but now I just do some dancing and singing on the side.
That's cool too! I love to watch movies and TV shows, so I always enjoy seeing actors and actresses in action.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun! I'm glad you enjoy watching us.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Not really, I'm just going to relax and enjoy my free time.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm going to be working on a new writing project, so I'll be busy, but I'm looking forward to it.
Oh, that sounds exciting! I hope it goes well for you.
Thank you! I'm sure it will.
